text: Roy James Gaines (August 12, 1934 - August 11, 2021) was an American Texas blues and electric blues guitarist and singer-songwriter. He wrote and recorded the song "A Hell of a Night" in 1982. He was the younger brother of the blues musician Grady Gaines. Gaines died on August 11, 2021, a day before his 84th birthday. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American blues musicians Category:American guitarists Category:American blues singers Category:Musicians from Texas Category:Singer- songwriters from Texas
title: Roy Gaines
